title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Volunteer Opportunities
body: Volunteer Opportunities         Volunteers assist with performances in many ways at Wolf Trap. NPS Photo  The park is currently accepting applications for all of the following volunteer opportunities. Click on the links below to read a description and/or apply on-line. If you have questions and would like to contact the Volunteer Office directly, e-mail the office or call (703) 255-1893.  Â     Current Volunteer Opportunities
